resources.string: Sign in to Medinote to track and visualize your blood pressure easily
Caution: This chart represents the average values of all SYS, PUL, DIA measurements taken for each day, and you can view full details of all measurements in the All Records section.
MediNote helps you track and understand your blood pressure with ease. Stay healthy, stay informed!

I created MediNote because I saw how many people struggle to keep track of their blood pressure readings using notebooks. Writing them down is inconvenient, and it’s hard to see how your blood pressure changes over time. That’s why I built this app to make tracking simple, visual, and effortless.

With MediNote, you can easily record your blood pressure and view trends by day, week, or month. The app is designed to be user-friendly, completely offline, and 100% private-your data stays with you. No cloud storage, no sharing, just you and your health records.

I’ve also made MediNote an open-source project so anyone can contribute, improve, and expand its features. And this is just the beginning! I’m continuously working on new updates to make it even better.
Thank you for using MediNote. Stay tuned for more features!
Resetting the app will delete all your data, including your account details and all recorded blood pressure measurements. This action cannot be undone.
